prompts: Create a graceful fire-type Pokemon that gallops through grassy fields at sunset.
Show me a majestic creature with fiery mane, perfect for a fantasy adventure.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of wild horses with a fiery twist.
Generate a stunning design for a fire-type Pokemon with flowing mane and hooves.
Make a vibrant fire Pokemon that can run swiftly across diverse terrains.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a galloping horse with a bright, fiery appearance.
Give me a concept for a Pokemon that thrives in warm, sunny environments.
